con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="TestDeviceRecursif"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="TestCase DevicePrincipal"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> </xml-fragment>

con:method.name: getDevices
con:method.con:description: Return the devices list managed by the gateway

con:method.name: addDevices
con:method.con:description: Announce a gateway or register devices Can be the first step of the bootstrap process if Device content has a GatewayFunction

con:method.name: replaceDevices
con:method.con:description: Replace devices supported by the gateway

con:method.name: patchDevices
con:method.con:description: Partially Patch a list of devices data

con:method.name: getDevice
con:method.con:description: Return a device according its address

con:method.name: replaceDevice
con:method.con:description: Replace a device supported by the gateway

con:method.name: deleteDevice
con:method.con:description: Delete a single device

con:method.name: patchDevice
con:method.con:description: Partially updates the existing device definition. For the function array each element passed in will be cross-referenced against items in the existing function array using the id.If they match, the existing function will be updated.If there is no match the function will be added.For each function, only the attributes passed in will be updated in the existing function.

con:method.name: getDeviceFunction
con:method.con:description: Get a single Function of a device only attributes with matching scopes must be returned, if not specified all attributes are returned.

con:parameter.con:name: attributeScope
con:parameter.con:description: Scope to filter attributes by. Only attributes with matching scopes must be returned, if not specified all attributes are returned.

con:method.name: getDeviceAttribute
con:method.con:description: Get a single attribute of a device function

con:method.name: getGroups
con:method.con:description: Get all groups

con:method.name: getGroup
con:method.con:description: Get a single group

con:method.name: sendServices
con:method.con:description: The Talq Gateway provide informations about what services it manages Used during step2 of bootstrap process

con:method.name: getDataPackages
con:method.con:description: Get all the data packages available for a gateway

con:method.name: getDataPackage
con:method.con:description: Get the data package associated to the address

con:method.name: addDeviceClasses
con:method.con:description: Send all device classes supported by the gateway Used during step3 of bootstrap process

con:method.name: replaceDeviceClasses
con:method.con:description: Replace all device classes supported by the gateway

con:method.name: replaceDeviceClass
con:method.con:description: Replace a device class supported by the gateway

con:parameter.con:name: className
con:parameter.con:description: The class name of device to replace

con:method.name: deleteDeviceClass
con:method.con:description: Delete a device class supported by the gateway

con:parameter.con:name: className
con:parameter.con:description: The class name of device to delete

con:method.name: addLampTypes
con:method.con:description: Add a list of new lamp types

con:method.name: replaceLampTypes
con:method.con:description: List of lamp types which must be replaced.

con:method.name: getLampTypesCount
con:method.con:description: Return the number of lamp types attached to the client

con:method.name: getLampType
con:method.con:description: Return the lamp type according its address

con:method.name: replaceLampType
con:method.con:description: Replace a lamp type

con:parameter.con:name: lampTypeAddress
con:parameter.con:description: identifier of lamp type to replace

con:method.name: deleteLampType
con:method.con:description: Delete a lamp type

con:parameter.con:name: lampTypeAddress
con:parameter.con:description: identifier of lamp type to delete

con:method.name: sendLogReport
con:method.con:description: Send a log report

con:method.name: getLoggerConfig
con:method.con:description: Get the configuration of a logger

con:method.name: getDevices
con:method.con:description: Return the devices list managed by the gateway

con:parameter.con:name: attributeScope

con:method.con:description: Get a single attribute of a device function
